parameters.name: ContainerGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the elastic container instances in JSON format. You can specify up to 20 IDs.

parameters.name: ContainerGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic container instance.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of resources to return. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 20.

>  The number of returned resources is less than or equal to the specified number.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that determines the start point of the query. If this parameter is left empty, all results have been returned.

> You do not need to specify this parameter in the first request. Starting from the second request, you can obtain the token from the result returned by the previous request.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the elastic container instances belong. If you do not specify a resource group when you create an elastic container instance, the system automatically adds the instance to the default resource group in your account.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the elastic container instance. Valid values:

*   Pending: The instance is being started.
*   Running: The instance is running.
*   Succeeded: The instance runs successfully.
*   Failed: The instance fails to run.
*   Scheduling: The instance is being created.
*   ScheduleFailed: The instance fails to be created.
*   Restarting: The instance is being restarted.
*   Updating: The instance is being updated.
*   Terminating: The instance is being terminated.
*   Expired: The instance expires.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the elastic container instances are connected.

parameters.name: WithEvent
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return event information.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The ID of the zone in which the elastic container instances are deployed. If you do not specify this parameter, the system selects a zone.

This parameter is empty by default.
